title: How do I fix my PvP error in client?
body: It takes me about 5 tries to log on, and another 3 to connect to chat. It is obviously my computer since Riot has done nothing to fix this issue. So, how do I fix it?

replies.body: you could try to reinstall league and right click league and select run as administrator(keep in mind this will delete your item builds only your item builds)it helped me maybe it will help you.

sorry man dunno what to tell you
must be your computer
